snippet.title: Devil May Cry 4 Special Edition - Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
(Please view in Google Chrome at 1080p60 for best results.)

The smash-hit stylish action of Devil May Cry 4 returns in Special Edition, complete with five playable characters, improved gameplay, and new features. Available Summer 2015 for PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC!



'Like' Devil May Cry on Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/devilmaycry

Follow on Twitter
https://twitter.com/DevilMayCry

Official Web Site
http://www.DevilMayCry.com/4se

ILLUSTRATIONS：Kazuma Kaneko/ATLUS
